allowUnassociatedTargets.description: Whether targets must be registered with the Maintenance Window before tasks can be defined for those targets.

cutoff.description: The number of hours before the end of the Maintenance Window that Systems Manager stops scheduling new tasks for execution.

description.description: A description for the maintenance window.

duration.description: The duration of the Maintenance Window in hours.

enabled.description: Whether the maintenance window is enabled. Default: `true`.

endDate.description: Timestamp in [ISO-8601 extended format](https://www.iso.org/iso-8601-date-and-time-format.html) when to no longer run the maintenance window.

name.description: The name of the maintenance window.

schedule.description: The schedule of the Maintenance Window in the form of a [cron or rate expression](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/systems-manager/latest/userguide/reference-cron-and-rate-expressions.html).

scheduleOffset.description: The number of days to wait after the date and time specified by a CRON expression before running the maintenance window.

scheduleTimezone.description: Timezone for schedule in [Internet Assigned Numbers Authority (IANA) Time Zone Database format](https://www.iana.org/time-zones). For example: `America/Los_Angeles`, `etc/UTC`, or `Asia/Seoul`.

startDate.description: Timestamp in [ISO-8601 extended format](https://www.iso.org/iso-8601-date-and-time-format.html) when to begin the maintenance window.

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the resource. .If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering MaintenanceWindow resources.
